storyContext.title: Implement Desktop Three-Column Responsive Layout
storyContext.story: As a frontend developer, I want to implement the three-column responsive layout for large screens, so that desktop users can efficiently see documentation, articles, and the chatbot simultaneously.
storyContext.productGoalAlignment: This story aims to enhance the user experience for desktop users by providing an efficient layout that allows simultaneous viewing of documentation, articles, and the chatbot, thereby improving productivity and information access.

dependencies.dependency: Tailwind CSS (for responsive grid and styling)
app/layout.tsx or app/page.tsx (where the layout will be defined)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: On screens wider than 1024px, a three-column grid is displayed.
Columns are: "Documentation Links" (left), "Article Content" (middle), and "Chatbot Interface" (right).
The layout matches the structure in ux-showcase.html.
